messages.title: Your local candidate.
messages.content: Many local people have told me of their disillusionment with the Labour government 'Labour are just like the Conservatives'. People want a real change and the only party that will provide is the Liberal Democrats.
If elected as your truly local Member of Parliament I promise to be a strong and local champion for our community and will work hard to end years of Labour and Conservative neglect.
I will fight every day to make Grantham and Stamford a better place to live. I will be a strong and effective MP for all local people.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Support policies to ensure fairer taxation to put money back in your pocket.
Improvements are made to the services we rely on.
The protection of our local hospitals and surgeries through investment in our future.
Electoral reform so that every vote counts.

issues.economy: Harrish and Vince Cable discuss economic reform and cutting taxes for people on low and middle incomes.
issues.health: The protection of our local hospitals and surgeries through investment in our future.

leaflet.personalStatement: I will fight every day to make Grantham and Stamford a better place to live. I will be a strong and effective MP for all local people.

politicalExperience.achievements: Has campaigned in Stamford and benefited many local people.

contactInformation.address: PAO (Liberal Democrats), both of Redeemans Court, 9-10 St Georges Street, Stamford PE9 2BJ.

images.caption: Harrish and Vince Cable discuss economic reform and cutting taxes for people on low and middle incomes.
Harrish and the Liberal Democrats will make the welfare of the men and women of our Armed Forces a priority.
